scripts.electron:serve: wait-on tcp:3000 && npx tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist-electron')) fs.mkdirSync('dist-electron'); fs.writeFileSync('dist-electron/package.json', '{\"type\": \"commonjs\"}')" && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && npx tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist-electron')) fs.mkdirSync('dist-electron'); fs.writeFileSync('dist-electron/package.json', '{\"type\": \"commonjs\"}')" && electron-builder
